rukus.text: Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Adhkuru Ni`mata Allahi `Alaykum 'Idh Ja'atkum Junudun Fa'arsalna `Alayhim Rihaan Wa Junudaan Lam Tarawha Wa Kana Allahu Bima Ta`maluna Basiraan
Idh Ja'ukum Min Fawqikum Wa Min 'Asfala Minkum Wa 'Idh Zaghati Al-'Absaru Wa Balaghati Al-Qulubu Al-Hanajira Wa Tazunnuna Billahi Az-Zununa
Hunalika Abtuliya Al-Mu'uminuna Wa Zulzilu Zilzalaan Shadidaan
Wa 'Idh Yaqulu Al-Munafiquna Wa Al-Ladhina Fi Qulubihim MaraÄ‘un Ma Wa`adana Allahu Wa Rasuluhu 'Illa Ghururaan
Wa 'Idh Qalat Ta'ifatun Minhum Ya 'Ahla Yathriba La Muqama Lakum Farji`u Wa Yasta'dhinu Fariqun Minhumu An-Nabiya Yaquluna 'Inna Buyutana `Awratun Wa Ma Hiya Bi`awratin 'In Yuriduna 'Illa Firaraan
Wa Law Dukhilat `Alayhim Min 'Aqtariha Thumma Su'ilu Al-Fitnata La'atawha Wa Ma Talabbathu Biha 'Illa Yasiraan
Wa Laqad Kanu `Ahadu Allaha Min Qablu La Yuwalluna Al-'Adbara Wa Kana `Ahdu Allahi Mas'ulaan
Qul Lan Yanfa`akumu Al-Firaru 'In Farartum Mina Al-Mawti 'Awi Al-Qatli Wa 'Idhaan La Tumatta`una 'Illa Qalilaan
Qul Man Dha Al-Ladhi Ya`simukum Mina Allahi 'In 'Arada Bikum Su'aan 'Aw 'Arada Bikum Rahmatan Wa La Yajiduna Lahum Min Duni Allahi Waliyaan Wa La Nasiraan
Qad Ya`lamu Allahu Al-Mu`awwiqina Minkum Wa Al-Qa'ilina Li'ikhwanihim Halumma 'Ilayna Wa La Ya'tuna Al-Ba'sa 'Illa Qalilaan

Ashihhatan `Alaykum Fa'idha Ja'a Al-Khawfu Ra'aytahum Yanzuruna 'Ilayka Taduru 'A`yunuhum Kalladhi Yughsha `Alayhi Mina Al-Mawti Fa'idha Dhahaba Al-Khawfu Salaqukum Bi'alsinatin Hidadin 'Ashihhatan `Ala Al-Khayri 'Ula'ika Lam Yu'uminu Fa'ahbata Allahu 'A`malahum Wa Kana Dhalika `Ala Allahi Yasiraan
Yahsabuna Al-'Ahzaba Lam Yadh/habu Wa 'In Ya'ti Al-'Ahzabu Yawaddu Law 'Annahum Baduna Fi Al-'A`rabi Yas'aluna `An 'Anba'ikum Wa Law Kanu Fikum Ma Qatalu 'Illa Qalilaan
